connections.name: Local SQL Express
connections.description: Local target database for replicated data

scripts.name: Sanitize User Data
scripts.description: Remove sensitive user information for development
scripts.content:
-- Sanitize user personal information
UPDATE Users 
SET 
    Email = CONCAT('user', Id, '@company-dev.local'),
    Phone = '555-0000',
    SSN = NULL,
    CreditCardNumber = NULL
WHERE IsTestUser = 0;

-- Update environment settings
UPDATE AppConfig 
SET Value = 'development'
WHERE Key = 'Environment';

scripts.name: Setup Development Environment
scripts.content:
-- Create development admin user
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Users WHERE Email = 'admin@company-dev.local')
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO Users (Id, Email, FirstName, LastName, IsTestUser, CreatedAt)
    VALUES (NEWID(), 'admin@company-dev.local', 'Dev', 'Admin', 1, GETDATE());
END

-- Enable debug features
UPDATE FeatureFlags 
SET IsEnabled = 1
WHERE Name IN ('DebugMode', 'DeveloperTools');

replicationConfigs.name: Development to Local
replicationConfigs.description: Replicate development database to local with sanitization
